title: Nerf Akali's W
body: Akali's W is currently too long, which causes a lot of death. So, change the duration from 5 / 5.5 / 6 / 6.5 / 7 to 4.75 / 5.25 / 5.75 / 6.25 / 6.75 or little shorter than that

replies.body: Counterplay is what it needs.

A skillshot on a target you can't see.

A lot of people don't read abilities, don't worry about it, her W can still be revealed she just can't be targeted while inside of it. It's called Obscured. You can land a skilshot on something you CAN see right?

When she takes damage she briefly flashes, but the only ways she can be 'revealed' is TF ult, tower, and probably other forms of true sight (maybe lulu E?) I don't think pinks work but I haven't seen it tried.

EDIT: Nid passive works

Either way some champs aren't entirely skillshot reliant. Sure theres no real difference when diving a xerath but what about azir, brand (E), Anivia etc. (although anivia is probably actually an excellent counter if she ults her smoke)
Tower doesn't reveal her though?
Yes it does, they even proved it in the spotlight when she went under tower and the person with the green bar was the anivia not her.
Her silhouette becomes "visible" but neither you nor the tower can target her still.

Thing is how is this useful information. 1 the reveal is delayed 2 most people have longer cooldowns than 1 second and most people also dont have more than one damage dealing skill shot if any.
So you cant see her so you use your skill shot to hope you reveal her so that you can throw your skill shot at her but you already used your skill shot.
Its useful in teamfights, when your frontline buys a sunfire or you have a Morg/Anivia then everyone else knows where to aim, or where to position to get their clicks off
She gains a Movespeed Buff and you get revealed only when True SIght or Towers show you and you are still not targetable ( True Sight from Lee Sin Q and E or Lulu E )

Every time you hit your opponent or use ANYTHING at all, you will no longer be obscured, couple that with her being revealed during the dive just being untargetable by single target abilities and it is not risk free.

Man with that Logic Stopwatch being online at the start of the game is balanced. When diving you can wait for your cooldowns by going into Shroud. People that know how to play the game will take 2-3 turret shots then go to shroud to switch turret agro to an ally helping the dive and it is easily executed. Imagine if Yasuo could go into a Shroud thingy and wait for his cooldowns to continue the dive AND after the kill be able to leave turret agro almost instantly.
As long as it doesn't have huge ass MS buff while inside... Including the fact she must use it under True Sight to even be visible.
In order to get the full duration she has to repeatedly reveal herself and shes vulnerable to aoe.  That is counterplay.
